intro - Introduction to the Shore Common code

CONTENTS

  • DESCRIPTION
  • SEE ALSO

DESCRIPTION

The classes in the common directory are available for use by any Shore users, but they are intended for those writing value-added servers.

SEE ALSO

errlog(common), lid_t(common), options(common), vec_t(common), nbox_t(common), serial_t(common), latch_t(common), rsrc(common), and intro(fc)
